matches.explanation: Missed: Red Team's 'Artifacts bucket lacks encryption configuration, potentially exposing sensitive build artifacts' on aws_s3_bucket.pipeline_artifacts was not detected
Missed: Red Team's 'Build agent security group allows unrestricted inbound access from any IP' on aws_security_group.build_agents was not detected
No matching finding for vulnerability: Pipeline role has overly broad permissions across multiple critical services
Partial match: Red Team's 'No access logging configured for pipeline artifacts bucket' on aws_s3_bucket.pipeline_artifacts was partially detected as 'Missing S3 Access Logging' on pipeline_artifacts

Partial match: Red Team's 'Cross-account role trust lacks ExternalId condition, increasing vulnerability to confused deputy attacks' on aws_iam_role.pipeline_role was partially detected as 'Insecure Cross-Account Role Trust' on pipeline_role
